title: Gensol Engineering secures Rs 463 crore solar plant project in Gujarat
description: The project will be a state-of-the-art solar facility, featuring a fixed tilt module mounting structure and other system components, according to a company statement.Gensol Engineering secures Rs 463 crore solar plant project in Gujarat
content: Gensol Engineering on Monday said it has secured an order worth Rs 463 crore to set up a solar plant at Gujaratâ€™s Khavda RE Power Park. The project will be a state-of-the-art solar facility, featuring a fixed tilt module mounting structure and other system components, according to a company statement. Gensol Engineering has received an order for the engineering, design, procurement, erection, testing, and commissioning of a Rs 463 crore solar plant at Khavda RE Power Park in the Rann of Kutch, Gujarat, the statement said. Established in 2012, Gensol Engineering Ltd, is a leading player in the renewable energy sector specialising in solar power engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC) services, along with electric mobility solutions.
